attributes.action: prevent the externalising of Bury Youth Service and to allow services for young people to remain under the control of the Local Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Proposals to put Bury Youth Service out to tender are very worrying. If this plan goes ahead, it potentially threatens youth centres, summer play schemes and other local services for young people, not to mention 48 jobs. Please sign the petition to protect this valuable service.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the appropriate local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
